entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 29 April 2023
